routes.description: Easy route for the beginner! NO BIG HILLS!  Ride from the Santa Cruz Courthouse to Capitola Village and back.  Fun for cyclists of all skill levels. Ride a beach cruiser, a tandem, your Burning man art bike or a fixie! Wear a costume!  Tell everyone to come ride: family, friends, and co-workers!  Starting time is 9am.
This fun route hugs the coastline from The Boardwalk to Seacliff.  It has beautiful coastal views, a couple easy to moderate climbs and two rest stops.  Starting time is 9 am.

routes.summary: 3,319 feet of climbing, 3 aid stations, 2 food stops
routes.description: The 65 mile route is under review for the 2016 ride.  Check back later for confirmed route.  Start time is 8 am.

routes.summary: 4,829 feet of climbing, 5 aid stations, 2 food stops
routes.description: The 100 mile route is under review for the 2016 ride.  Check back later for confirmed route.    Starting time is 7 am.
